titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3030) to amend the Community Service Block Grant Act to provide for quality improvements.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3030) to amend the Community Service Block Grant Act to provide for quality improvements.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-412, by Mrs. Myrick.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 144.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-412, by Mrs. Myrick.

The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Education and the Workforce now printed in the bill shall be considered as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 513.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3030) (Improving the Community Services Block Grant Act of 2004).
